```{r}
library('quantmod')
library('tidyverse')
library('openxlsx')

USDJPY <- getSymbols("USDJPY=X", src="yahoo", 
                     from="2025-01-01", to="2025-08-19", 
                     auto.assign=FALSE)
USDJPY
```
```{r}
USDJPY <- data.frame(date=index(USDJPY), 
                     coredata(USDJPY))
USDJPY
```

```{r}
USDJPY <- select(USDJPY, date, close=USDJPY.X.Close)
USDJPY
```
```{r}
write.xlsx(USDJPY, file="USDJPY.xlsx")

```
